actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to place a restriction on the granting of eminent domain powers by the Federal Government with respect to bridges over the Delaware River between New Jersey and Pennsylvania.

summary.text: Conditions the granting of the power of eminent domain with respect to any bridge over the Delaware River between Pennsylvania and New Jersey upon the consent of the highway departments of the two States.

titles.title: A bill to place a restriction on the granting of eminent domain powers by the Federal Government with respect to bridges over the Delaware River between New Jersey and Pennsylvania.
